Constructor Detail

HedgeTagger

public HedgeTagger(java.lang.String trainedModelFile)
Creates an instance of HedgeTagger with the Words feature set

Parameters:
trainedModelFile - the file that contains the trained model for the Words feature set based algorithm

HedgeTagger

public HedgeTagger(HedgeTagger.HedgeDetectionFeatureSet hedgeDetectionFeatureSet,
                   java.lang.String trainedModelFile,
                   java.lang.String cueTaggingModel,
                   java.lang.String grammerFile)
Creates an instance of HedgeTagger with the given feature set

Parameters:
hedgeDetectionFeatureSet - the feature set to use to determine the scope of hedge cue
trainedModelFile - the file which contains the model trained for the given hedgeDetectionAlgorithm
cueTaggingModel - the algorithm to use to mark the cue of the sentence. This depends on the hedgeDetection algorithm used. If the algorithm used has the suffix CRF, then the CRF model file (crf_cue_hedge_trained_model) should be used, else the Regex model file (baseline_cue_hedge_trained_model) should be used
grammerFile - the file containing stanford part-of-speech grammer
Method Detail

tagHedgeScope

public java.lang.String tagHedgeScope(java.lang.String sentence)
Tags the hedge scope in the given sentence

Parameters:
sentence - the sentence to tag
Returns:
the given sentence with each word tagged to define the hedge scope
